com.defano.jmonet.tools

Class SlantTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.BasicTool<SelectionToolDelegate>
      • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.SelectionTool
        • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.TransformTool
          • com.defano.jmonet.tools.SlantTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanvasCommitObserver, SurfaceInteractionObserver, SelectionToolDelegate, Tool, TransformToolDelegate, MutableSelection, Selection, MarchingAntsObserver, KeyListener, EventListener

    public class SlantTool
extends TransformTool
implements TransformToolDelegate
    Tool for drawing a rectangular selection boundary with drag-handles to shear/slant the image from the top or bottom.

    • Method Detail

      • moveTopLeft

        public void moveTopLeft(FlexQuadrilateral quadrilateral,
                        Point newPosition,
                        boolean isShiftDown)
        Invoked to indicate that the user has dragged/moved the top-left handle of the transform quadrilateral to a new position. Transforms the selection frame and bounded pixels accordingly.
        Specified by:
        moveTopLeft in interface TransformToolDelegate
        Parameters:
        quadrilateral - The quadrilateral representing the transform bounds.
        newPosition - The new location of the affected drag handle.
        isShiftDown - True to indicate user is holding shift down; implementers may optionally use this flag to constrain drag movement or apply some other feature of the transform.

      • moveTopRight
